about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Relive the classic days of the Underground, take on new challenges and explore more on Bakerloo Line with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys – Silver 1972 Stock.

Celebrate the 50-year history of the 1972 Mk2 Tube Stock with this rendition of its original brushed Aluminium guise, complete with bold red painted doors and striking grey accents across the front and roof. Delve into the festivities with railtour services on the Bakerloo Line, giving enthusiasts and commuters a taste of how things used to be for this veteran London Underground stock.

Key Features


  • 1972 Mk2 Tube Stock in original Aluminium & Red livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • 3 detailed and engaging scenarios on Bakerloo Line
  • Operable on both original and new Bakerloo Line Timetables
  • Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
  • Download size: 158.36 MB
